name: mindful

formal careful not to forget about something: Mindful of the poor road conditions, she reduced her speed to 30 mph. Politicians are increasingly mindful that young voters are turning away from traditional parties.
deliberately aware of your body, mind, and feelings in the present moment, in order to create a feeling of calm: I'm trying to be more mindful and I think it helps me with stress.
